CustomField.description: Date of largest (partial soft-credit) gift made by this Account. See "Combined Largest Gift Date" for date of largest gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date of largest (partial soft-credit) gift made by this Account. See "Combined Largest Gift Date" for date of largest gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Largest Partial Soft Credit Date
